reviews.title: Pretty addicting however….
reviews.name: Pretty addicting however….
reviews.text: Other one of the new versions the action of removing tiles or doing actions happens now before your rocket hits or bomba goes off. It is not satisfying at all to see a result before the cause can hit the object. Hard to explain but very annoying if you understand what I am getting at. I want to see the cause and then the result by the other way around.

reviews.title: Love the game and the story but
reviews.name: Love the game and the story but
reviews.text: The puzzles are fun, and it’s compelling to have to earn points to move forward in the storyline.  My only issue and a warning until the bug hopefully is fixed, is that when you are presented with the opportunity to get extra coins after successfully completing a level, the game crashes either before or during the ad. When you restart it you have to do the level all over again.  I will still play and enjoy the game, even promote it to my friends, but I won’t be watching anymore ads to get extra coins.

reviews.title: Fun Game
reviews.name: Fun Game
reviews.text: I really enjoy this game! I have taken a break from it for a while. But when I returned my levels we’re still there. And the upgrades were fabulous! I only wish the game had the same scenario they showed on the teasers. It would make it more exciting to help Lilly and he baby survive. She is shown walking through the snow with her baby. But that’s not what is on the game. SMH…

reviews.title: Frustrated
reviews.name: Frustrated
reviews.text: I have been playing this game for several months…. Since right before the latest update, ridiculously bad after the update, I will be in the middle of playing a level and the game crashes and I have to start the level over. I lose a life and I am only able to play MAYBE 1 level before I’m kicked out again. I’m uninstalling. Will retry installing but if no improvement will uninstall permanently. Uninstalling the game is sad, cause I really enjoy the game. It’s nice to use as a small distraction from the daily life of being a mom. 😁

reviews.title: Addicting

reviews.title: Lily’s garden
reviews.name: Lily’s garden
reviews.text: I love Lily’s garden!! I think I have been playing almost from the beginning. Not really sure when it first came out. During the pandemic it was a life saver for me. It gave me something to do other than watching tv. You can just clean house so much. Thank you tactical team for making life just a little bit easier.

reviews.title: I hate Mary’s Gallery!
reviews.name: I hate Mary’s Gallery!
reviews.text: I hate Mary’s Gallery. The game is an exercise in futility- almost impossible to advance. Please allow us to keep playing the real game even when we’ve exhausted the content. (Otherwise it also doesn’t make sense to purchase any offer when there is no content and all that pops up is that horrible Mary’s Gallery).  I would give the game 5 stars;  but I really dislike Mary’s Gallery and as soon as it pops up, I have to go play something else….
Really goood gameee!
